description:
Horde Mode for Scrap Mechanic.
Defeat waves of enemies with powerful guns!

While advanced movement is enabled, [b]X[/b] opens the weapon wheel, and [b]C[/b] opens the weapon mod wheel(will be more useful once I add more weapon mods). [b]Using advanced movement fucks up the scroll wheel, you wont be able to switch between inventory items. I recommend using the numbers on your keyboard, or the weapon wheel to swap weapons. If you do use the scroll wheel, either the weapon wheel or the weapon mod wheel will get stuck. Pressing X and C will fix it.[/b]

Press [b]R[/b] to switch between weapon mods!
[b]Spudgun[/b]:
[list]
    [*][b]Charged Burst[/b]:
[list]
    [*]Hold right click to charge up the burst, release right click to fire off the burst.
    [*]After firing off the burst, a usage cooldown is applied to the entire gun.
    [*]A fully charged burst consists of 35 shots.
[/list]
    [*][b]Spread Shot[/b]:
[list]
    [*]Fires off 5 shots at once, each of them 5 degrees apart.
    [*]Continuously firing will increase the spread angle.
[/list]
[/list]

[b]Shotgun[/b]:
[list]
    [*][b]Full Auto[/b]:
[list]
    [*]Firing while holding right click will fire the shotgun continuously(3 shots per second).
[/list]
    [*][b]Explosive Shot[/b]:
[list]
    [*]Firing while holding right click will shoot an explosive tape.
[/list]
    [*][b]Meathook[/b]:
[list]
    [*]Enemies that you can pull yourself to will be highlighted with an icon.
    [*]Click on them to start pulling yourself to them(may have to be a little precise).
    [*]While advanced movement is enabled, pressing the jump key will launch your upwards and disconnect the hook.
    [*]The hook has a 5 second long usage cooldown.
[/list]
[/list]


Commands:
--[b]HOST ONLY[/b]--
[list]
    [*][b]/start[/b]: starts the waves
    [*][b]/stop[/b]: stops the waves, use /start to start them again
    [*][b]/restart[/b]: restart the game from the beginning
    [*][b]/inv[/b]: toggles creative inventory
    [*][b]/god[/b]: toggles god mode
    [*][b]/pvp[/b]: toggles pvp
    [*][b]/goto[/b]: the game skips to the specified wave
[/list]

--[b]FOR EVERYONE[/b]--
[list]
    [*][b]/aircontrol[/b]: toggles air control
    [*][b]/movement[/b]: toggles advanced movement
[/list]
name: Horde Mode
